CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper April 21, 1945, pg. 15, reads: "Congratulations - National Vice Commander, Veterans of Foreign Wars Joseph Stack, who is also Chief of County Detectives, gives his best wishes to Commander Herman Armstrong at the newly created Angell-Bolen Post, Frankstown and Braddock Avenues. Mrs. Lillian Stevenson of the VFW Ladies Auxiliary, and Harry Theil, County Commander of VFW, look on. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Lillian Stevenson, Herman Armstrong shaking hands with Joseph Stack, and Harry Theil posed in front of American flag in Angell - Bolen VFW Post 4040, 7313 Frankstown Avenue, Homewood
